content:
<rule id="test-frameworks-sauge-00160" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="jcunit{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - JCUnit">
                    <description>The application embeds the JCunit library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">JCunit</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
